How To Use SkitteNewsAPI

1. USING HTTP CLIENTS

import http.client
import mimetypes
conn = http.client.HTTPSConnection('https://skittenewsapi.herokuapp.com')
payload = ''
headers = {
'Cookie': 'csrftoken=BjXCtSZ7QQxzKDCoIi1hZdx0PswzAlE2veryyaCx5JtF5AcbmBIwtjMJMZ7m2Ob6' }
conn.request('GET', '/doc/auth-api/user/key/46/?key={%if key%}{{key}}{%else%} 'yourapikey' {%endif%}', payload, headers)
res = conn.getresponse()
data = res.read()
print(data.decode("utf-8"))

2. USING HTTP REQUESTS

import requests
url = "https://skittenewsapi.herokuapp.com/doc/auth-api/user/key/46/?key={%if key%}{{key}}{%else%}yourapikey{%endif%}"
payload = {}
headers = {
'Cookie': 'csrftoken=BjXCtSZ7QQxzKDCoIi1hZdx0PswzAlE2veryyaCx5JtF5AcbmBIwtjMJMZ7m2Ob6' }
response = requests.request("GET", url, headers=headers, data = payload)
print(response.text.encode('utf8'))
